column3: So platform could offer Perl5 plugin from the repo
IMO platform should offer the plugin from repo regardless of presence simple custom file type
Yep, agree, but don't know how to do this :)

Am i getting this right that all file types generated from defaultFileType.xml are AbstractFileType or UserBinaryFileType so i just need to add a checking for it into the PluginAdvertiserEditorNotificationProvider#createNotificationPanel ?
Thanks for bringing the issue to our attention. We are working to support this functionality ourselves, it is important part of CE behaviour.
